header.title: Foil the Plan! Free Your Mind!

title: Foil the Plan! Free Your Mind!
content:
You’ve made it through another week relatively unscathed. Hopefully, so did your brain. <!--more--> Poor thing probably was in overdrive all week, trying to decipher the avalanche of “news” from everywhere.
Now, tell us how you foiled the plan to confuse us all.
Share your clarity about this week’s major news issues and events—or anything else worth talking about, for that matter.
Call 888-874-4888 and show us how you freed your mind!
